channel.title: Anyone know how i can change
channel.description: Range... Ok my problem lies with the crystal bow and karils crossbow. crystal bow fires from far away but always hits 0... ALWAYS! karils bow is the opposite it walks upto the monster/person and has to be next to them to fire... can anyone help please.[br][size=1]Posted at: October 31, 2006, 03:19:24 AM[/size][hr]0 posts ... no one can help me?
